fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Turn an Umbrae's visit astral, you cannot target the Prophet.
- (Day Ability : {1} Use) Empower the Full Moon and turn it into a Blood Moon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the Blood Moon, you have Powerful defense.
- During a Blood Moon, you may issue a Basic, Astral attack.
- During the Full Moon, you have Basic defense.
- If you are the last remaining Umbrae member you will become the Prophet.
- Detection Immunity
- Conversion Immunity
